thread.title: Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer - Stranger Things Season 2 Release Date
thread.title_full: Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer - Stranger Things Season 2 Release Date

author: Julie Kosin
title: Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer - Stranger Things Season 2 Release Date
text: These days, we'll take every bit of good news we can get. Following the release of the first image from Season 2 of Stranger Things on Friday, Netflix blessed us during tonight's Super Bowl with the first trailer for the show's newest season, which sadly won't be released until HALLOWEEN —WHY, NETFLIX?! Watch the 32-second teaser—filled with Eggos, goosebumps and Ghostbusters costumes—below.
